# datapower_assemblyactionsetvar (Data Source)

Set variable assembly action

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "datapower_assemblyactionsetvar" "test" {
  depends_on = [datapower_assemblyactionsetvar.test]
  app_domain = "acc_test_domain"
}
```
